mapper.sql: id, note_no, phase_no, interview_time, name, sex, school, profession, education, phone, email, card_no, qq_no, job, work_start, work_end, graduate_date, salary, assess, first_try, second_try, view_remark, location, offer_state, three_side, pay_time, three_state, refuse, refuse_reson, refuse_date, breaker, train, staff_no, interview_dept, fenpei_dept, yuan_dept, organize, leader, one_result, two_result, true_time, one_overtime, state, assigned_interviewer, year, is_deleted
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from student_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select currval('student_info_id_seq')
insert into student_info (note_no, phase_no, interview_time, name, sex, school, profession, education, phone, email, card_no, qq_no, job, work_start, work_end, graduate_date, salary, assess, first_try, second_try, view_remark, location, offer_state, three_side, pay_time, three_state, refuse, refuse_reson, refuse_date, breaker, train, staff_no, interview_dept, fenpei_dept, yuan_dept, organize, leader, one_result, two_result, true_time, one_overtime, state, assigned_interviewer, year, is_deleted) values (#{noteNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phaseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interviewTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{graduateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{salary,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{assess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstTry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondTry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offerState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{threeSide,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{threeState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{refuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refuseReson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refuseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{breaker,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{train,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interviewDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fenpeiDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yuanDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oneResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{twoResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oneOvertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignedInterviewer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})
